edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.PhysicsSprite
      • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends PhysicsSprite
    Projectiles are entities that can be thrown from the hero's location in order to remove enemies. Note that there is no public interface to this file. Projectiles should be controlled via ProjectilePool.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.lehigh.cse.lol.PhysicsSprite
